EASTERN SOUTH ATLANTIC.
DNC 01.
DISTRESS SIGNAL RECEIVED ON 406 MHZ IN
35-10.3S 013-04.9E. VESSELS IN VICINITY REQUESTED
TO KEEP A SHARP LOOKOUT, ASSIST IF POSSIBLE.
REPORTS TO MRCC CAPE TOWN, PHONE: 272 1938 3300,
272 1551 0700, E-MAIL: MARITIMERADIO@IXMAIL.CO.ZA,
MRCC.CT@SAMSA.ORG.ZA.
